48.ara-name: كتاب الدعوات عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Aishah narrated from Abu Bakr As-Siddiq,:that whenever the Prophet (ﷺ) wanted to do a matter, he would say: “O Allah, make it good for me and choose for me. (Allāhumma khir lī wakhtar lī)”

chapter.eng-name: The Supplication: “O Allah Make it Good For Me And Choose For Me”
